text: @realDonaldTrump You’re going to lose the election anyway,  but Americans don’t want to lose their lives by going out to the polls to vote during a deadly pandemic. We know you don’t care about our safety, it’s why the USA leads the world in cases and deaths from coronavirus. Have you no decency?
